entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
